title: 44th President Barack Obama

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, deploy a drone at someone's house. The drone acts as an astral Lookout at that house each night. The drone stays on the same target until you change it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each time you vote out an Evil player during the day, your Presidential Power increases by 1.
- At 1 Presidential Power, you can order a Drone Strike during the day up to twice per game, attacking whoever the drone is currently on.
- At 2 Presidential Power, your drone will guard whoever it's on, granting them basic defense. You can't use this on yourself.
- At 3 Presidential Power, your vote counts as 3 and you are revealed as 44th President Barack Obama. You can no longer be healed at night.

desc:
